alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Salt Basin; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 11:57PM CST until January 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of far west Texas and south-central New Mexico including El Paso, parts of Hudspeth, Dona Ana, and Otero Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and holiday decorations. A few tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Salt Basin; Western El Paso County
